title: Happy Birthday, Kotori-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Happy birthday, Kotori<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Thank you~, Maki-chan♪ So, the party will be at the usual place, right? The clubroom?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait! How did you know? Was it Honoka!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Both Honoka-chan and Umi-chan never said anything, but their behavior….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>*sigh*~.... That sounds like them…. When we said to keep it a secret from Kotori their eyes lit up…. I guess that would be a dead giveaway, huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe. But I’m really happy! After all, everyone prepared a party for me even though it’s a holiday♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Of course. In fact, because it is a holiday, the scale of today’s party will be even bigger than a weekday party. Prepare yourself, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, how exciting~. Everyone gathered for me today, and we also have Nijigaku’s live to watch in the afternoon, this whole day is packed with fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>We’ll be watching Nijigaku’s live on my big screen TV, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Wooow-! This is the best birthday ever~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
